page.title: 18Mrs.Gardner
page.content: Mrs.Gardner keeps boarding kennels for cats and dogs.She lives at West Langton Lodge Farm.She is the widow of Jack Gardner,the famous heavy-weight boxer.She gets up at 6 o'clock to take her own dog for a 2 mile walk,then cleans and feeds the cats.Two helpers exercise the dogs while she cleans the 30 pens in a big shed.She then checks the fencing for the sheep and cows, does the gardens and has lunch, followed by another exercise for the dogs.She feeds them once a day and sometimes grooms them.At the moment she has 3 labradors,a border collie,a whippet,an alsation and 2 cats.They come when their owners are on holiday or are ill.They come from all over Leicestershire,Northamptonshire and even from London.They must have injections for distemper.
